import React from 'react' import StockSVG from '../../assets/stock.svg' import "../styles/StatsRow.css" import { db } from './firebase' function StatsRow(props) { const buyStock = () => { } const percentChange = ( (props.price - props.openPrice)/props.openPrice)*100; return (

{props.name}

{props.shares && (props.shares + "shares")}

{props.price}

{Number(percentChange).toFixed(2)}

) } export default StatsRow
